author: Brenda Goh
title: 'This is bliss': Chinese barber has clients queuing up as Wuhan eases lockdown
description: For barber Xiong Juan, a recent easing of restrictions in the city of Wuhan, epicenter of China's coronavirus outbreak, means she is now busier than ever.
content:
WUHAN, China (Reuters) - For barber Xiong Juan, a recent easing of restrictions in the city of Wuhan, epicenter of China’s coronavirus outbreak, means she is now busier than ever. 
Xiong, 39, now spends her days riding around on her electric bicycle and offe… [+2177 chars]
